price: 80. Hij zei: “Ik wenste dat ik de kracht had om jullie te overweldigen of dat ik tenminste een krachtige ondersteuning had (zodat ik jullie kon stoppen)."
arabic: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla law anna lī bikum quwwatan aw āwī ilā ruk'nin shadīdin
